title: Karnataka Bengaluru Live Updates: Six schools in Bengaluru receive bomb threats - The Indian Express
content:

description: Bangalore News Today Updates, Bangalore Today, Karnataka Live News, Bengaluru, Karnataka Today News Live, 8 Apr: Bomb squads and senior police officials rushed to the locations after the schools received the bomb threat
